title: Iconic monument
text: Due to the current Covid 19 situation the crowd was very less . This place will really take you back in time. If you need to understand the entire acropolis history hire a guide

title: Must visit place
text: This place is very well maintained and the views are really great. Would recommend buying the combined all attractions ticket for 30 which can be used to view some 7 monuments. In summer pack some water & juices and a hat is must cause its really hot

title: Nice Museum
text: This is a well maintained museum with a good collection of Greek artifacts. Their videos explain about the history of acropolis

title: Small rooms with good service
text: This hotel is located closely to many tourist spots . The rooms are small but are clean and neat.The receptionist was very helpful in guiding on the places to visit and also helped in getting the tickets.

title: Good hotel with friendly staff
text: A very nice hotel close to city. You have subway close by within 5 to 10 minutes walk. The staff are really supportive and helpful.The rooms are small but are maintained well. You have an option for single beds or queen size beds

title: Good place
text: Their chocolates are really good and they have very good options.Their baked foods are also good . One of the must try in Arlanda airport

title: Nice stay
text: This place is good for short business trip stays in Kista. They have a decent restaurant which serves breakfast and dinner . Their lobby is also well structured for having quick discussions or meetings. In the evenings you can use their Souna as well.

title: Good Food
text: Italian Restaurant with good service, Its located close to the entrance of the waterfalls and next to "Haus der 1000 Uhren"

title: Very nice museum
text: This museum has a good collection of musical instruments & minerals collection . The place is well maintained

title: Good Quality cuckoo clocks
text: This store has a good collection of clocks along with other souvenir items . The staff in this store are really helpful in explaining the functionality of the clocks.

title: Beautiful Waterfalls
text: A very good trekking experience, walked all the way till the top. The view from the waterfalls is also amazing

title: Amazing experience
text: this is an excellent ride covering the vine yards. each chairlift can accommodate 2 persons, be it adult or kids. Its a good 15 to 20 minute ride

title: Not a must visit place
text: this place is covered by mist most of the time and is always crowded. Its just a 5 - 10 minutes walk to get to a view point. If interested you can walk / climb further higher but I think still there would be nothing much interesting

title: Average hotel
text: Stayed here for nearly 4 weeks between July to August 2019, the rooms are okay for a single traveler, but the price you pay for it is expensive. The cleaning staff are good and the rooms are cleaned on a daily basis

title: Good place to visit
text: This place is not crowded as the kodaikanal Lake. The place is maintained well and also has very few boats available .

title: Boating in Lake
text: This place is crowded most of the time and hence the waiting time to get boats is usually 30 minutes plus.You have a variety of boat options which you can hire

title: Well maintained Pary
text: This park is well maintained and is good for evening walks . There is also an open place for kids to play

title: Must visit restaurant in Kodai
text: Visited this place with my family, the food was really good. Their wood burn pizza is a must try. They have a decent desert spread as well.

title: Nice and Quiet place
text: Well maintained rooms with good amenities . Their restaurant is among the best in Madurai with a very good spread. The staff were very polite and helpful . This place is within 5 Kms of the famous Meenakshi Temple

title: Mexican food with a twist
text: This place has got a very good spread of Mexican cuisine. Should really appreciate the presentation of the food. Its a bit expensive compared to other Mexican restaurants, but really worth the try.

title: Good budget airline
text: This is one of the airlines with On time track record and a decent service . The ground crew are really helpful and very customer friendly.

title: Nice & Fresh tasty food
text: This is one of the must visit places for amazing pastries and quick bites. Their breads are really good and are displayed inside the cafe. Their staff are really helpful and the service is really quick.

title: Entry to Bhutan
text: This is the entry point through which you will enter to Bhutan from India.It has the Jaigoan town on one side and Phuntsholing on the other side. People do cross this border daily for shopping between Jaigoan and Phuntsholing

title: Vegetarian Indian food
text: Good Indian vegetarian restaurant. The service takes time as they start preparing the food fresh after ordering. So it takes a minimum 30 to 40 minutes to get food delivered

title: Good Location and Comfortable stay
text: Hotel Damchen is strategically located with close proximity to Bhutan Gate, Immigration Office and the shopping area. It also has an temple and Park on the opposite side. The rooms are clean and the staffs are also very friendly. Their restaurant has a very good spread of Indian and continental dishes and the food is good.

title: Nice and Quiet place
text: This is one of the places to visit in the evening time where you can relax in the park . This temple is located in the center of Phuntsholing town. Usually people spend around an hour or two in this temple

title: Good scenic place to view himalayas
text: The highest point on the Punakha Road and it has 108 stupas built in memory of Bhutanese soldiers killed in the 2003 war against insurgents from North East India. This place also has an restaurant nearby which offers some decent food. The view from this place is really stunning when the clouds are clear

title: Restaurant near to Dochula Pass
text: this place has some decent food and is located very close to the Dochula pass. From the windows of this restaurant you can view the himalayan ranges if the clouds are clear

title: Amazing place not to be missed
text: This Dzong is situated between 2 rivers and is currently an administrative office for various departments of the Bhutan government. The the events of the royal family is help here.

title: A Thrillingexperience
text: Walking in the bridge is a thrilling experience , It is not crowded after 5 PM and you can enjoy the views without any disturbance .

title: Must visit places when you are in Berlin
text: Historic stadium in Berlin. Its very well maintained . You will have to walk for long within the stadium

title: Must visit place in Berlin
text: you will have to make prior reservations to dine in , If you want to reach till the top you can buy the tickets at the entry point

title: An amazing place
text: I really enjoyed my visit to the Baths, the place is well maintained and the guides are really helpful

title: One of the must visit places in Berlin
text: You will have to make prior reservations to enter this place. The waiting time is long as there is heavy security checks

title: Must visit cathedral
text: This is one of the well maintained cathedrals in berlin, you can walk to the top of the dome as well if you wish to.

title: Good time pass
text: I would recommend this place if you are travelling with kids and are interested in sea life.The dome experience is really good

title: Good hangout place
text: There are lots of restaurants and shopping area around this place. there are some performance in the evening and is usually crowded till midnight

title: Must visit place
text: This is one of the must visit place in Berlin, You can take pictures with people dressed in military uniforms, One word of caution, you will see advertisements boards saying they can stamp your passport with the seals used during the cold war times, do not get your passport stamped with these seals.

title: Tummy Treat
text: The food is good, i would recommend going with an empty stomach. They serve you with a flow of barbecue in both veg and non veg. The price is slightly on the higher side compared to other barbecue places

title: Good Indian / Pakistani food
text: We found this place while searching for a Indian restaurant, their menu choice is really good. Their food is good and the staff are really friendly

title: Land mark building
text: A nice place to spend the evening if you are interested in music concerts or some shows. The tickets are a bit expensive but if you don't want to attend any concerts or shows you can visit the shops.
place: Harpa Reykjavik Concert Hall and Conference Centre

title: Must visit place
text: This is one of the must visit places in Reykjavik, you will have to pay to reach the top floor, the view is really amazing

title: Decent place
text: this place has two restaurant floors on the top two levels and pre-booking is mandatory. You can walk around the balcony to get a view of Reykjavik

title: Artistic walls
text: I really enjoyed walking along the wall. It has many paintings and you can also see a lot of people writing their names on the walls.

title: Legendary gates
text: This is one of a must visit place, The good time to visit will be in the evening or later. The lighting are really good in the night

title: Good
text: The exhibits are less when compared to London, however there were some German celebrities which were not there in London.

title: Amazing maze
text: this place is very unique , the blocks of stones are amazingly placed to showcase a wave like appearance
place: The Holocaust Memorial - Memorial to the Murdered Jews of Europe

title: Must visit
text: this museum has an amazing collection of old artifacts. Also their Egypt section is amazing with some coffins

title: Good walk from Brandenburg Gate
text: A good walk through the Tier garden from Brandenburg Gate to Victory Column, A very good evening walk

title: Awsome Palace
text: This is a very huge palace, you will have to do a bit of walking from the gate to the entrance. The queue to the entrance is also lengthy and it takes around 30 mins wait to get in. There is a separte ticket for the gardens . Must visit when in Paris.

title: An awsome experience
text: The hall of mirrors is inside the palace and will be part of your tour, no separate tickets needed. The artefacts in the display are also good

title: Royal Chapel
text: The Chapel can be viewed from the door and the public is not allowed to enter inside. The architecture of this is really fabulous

title: An excellent scenic experience
text: An evening walk along the banks is an amazing experience, you should do the boat trip at least twice, one in day light another one in the night. This will get some good views around

title: Excellent dining with great service
text: I really enjoyed my visit, the staffs are very polite and the service was really excellent. The orders were served quickly

title: Authentic Indian food
text: Been here a couple of times, the place is decent for dinner parties and lunch. The price is also okay

title: An awesome experience
text: I had visited Eiffel Tower during the day and during the night as well. I couldn't get the booking online, so had to queue up and get the entry tickets. During the day it’s pretty crowded and the wait time in long. I would recommend going after 7PM . It’s a must visit when you are to Paris .

title: War memorial
text: One of the must visit places while in Paris, the ideal time to reach here is in the evening ( Around 4PM ) when there is music and flag ceremony.

title: Must visit Cathedral
text: This is one amazing place to visit while you are in Paris, the architecture and the interiors is absolutely amazing

title: Beautiful Museum
text: The paintings and the Sculptures in this museum is absolutely fabulous, this place hosts the famous paintings of Leonardo da Vinci, the portrait of Mona Lisa. The hall in which this painting is hosted is crowded always. If you need to have a clear picture of this portrait then be prepared with a 20x zoom lens

title: Lovely Cathedral
text: I really enjoyed visiting this place , the interiors are absolutely amazing , this place is very welll maintained and I would say its a must visit place

title: An amazing place to visit in Paris
text: This place has a great collection of paintings from all over the world dating back to 13th Century. Also they have some exhibits from 17th century on furnitures and decoratives

title: Stunning gold Statues
text: A beautiful bridge with stunning gold statues. Nice place to walk in the evening. This place is covered in river cruise and open top bus tours.

title: Authentic South Indian fine Dining
text: An excellent south Indian fine dining restaurant . Their service is very good and the ambiance inside is really good

title: Very intersting rock formation
text: A unique coastal place to visit near Belfast, its less than a hour drive through country side with good scenic views on the way. You can walk along the coast for all day

title: One of the places to visit
text: This is a very nice park for evening walks. The park is well maintained . You can spend good time near the pond

title: One of the must visit places in London
text: This is one of the must visit places in london. They have a very good collection in their exhibit and its spread by geography.

title: Key tourist attraction
text: This is one of the main tourist attractions in London and is always buzzing with crowd. This is very near to the couple of other attractions so you can bundle them to plan a day long outing with Seaworld, Shrek adventure and Dungeons

title: Good fine dining Indian restaurant
text: Excellent food, visited with my colleagues for a dinner. The food is more of a set menu. Excellent service with good food.

title: Memorial for War heros
text: An awsome memorial to the war heroes on the hyde park. This is a must visit place when walking around hyde park

title: Awsome Thai food
text: This Thai restaurant is a must visit if you are a Thai food fan. The ambience of this place is really good. We went to this place after our day in the beach. The quality of the food was good and the service was also really quick

title: Good Ambience with decent food
text: This place has a very good ambience and ideal for family get to gethers on week days. On fridays and saturdays this place needs a reservation. The food is good.

title: Decent Indian Food
text: Want to taste spicy indian food then you can try this place, their menu has a decent spread. Locals prefer this for take away mostly so you can walk in any time in the evening

title: Authentic Indian food
text: This place has some ssignature dishes which you need to try. I am a vegetarian hence my options were limited. This place has a good ambience

title: the go to pizza place
text: this is near to where I stay so whenever I decide on having a pizza I just order from here and collect it.

title: Good place to hang out in summer
text: Thsi place is very well maintained and an usual picnic place in summer for locals. You can do a nature walk in the woods if interested

title: Good Indian Food
text: This place is always crowded and reservation is must. If you dont have a reservation you can still get a table by waiting for an hour. The service was good so I would rate 5/5 and the food I would rate at 4/5 cause I it wasnt the best.
